RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Persuasiveness
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how convincing a pawn is at proposing a vore attempt.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Beguilingly voresuasive
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: Forget a silver tongue; [PAWN_label] has a whole maw-full of gold and honey. Targets are much more likely to agree to [PAWN_possessive] proposals.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Voresuasive
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] has a silver tongue with the subject of vore. Targets are more likely to agree to [PAWN_possessive] proposals.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Neutral charm
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is not particularly persuasive or unpersuasive about vore.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Unvoresuasive
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] can't think of any good arguments for why you should do vore with [PAWN_objective]. Targets are less likely to agree to [PAWN_possessive] proposals.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Staggeringly unvoresuasive
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] could convince a rampaging predator not to eat [PAWN_objective]... so long as [PAWN_pronoun] was actively trying to get eaten. Targets are much less likely to agree to [PAWN_possessive] proposals.
